ygData.subject: rivervale clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: Somone asked about improving faction with Rivervale Clerics. I know of only one and it seems to have been pulled or I am at a maximum faction with them Get the
ygData.messageBody:
Somone asked about improving faction with Rivervale Clerics. I know of only
one and it seems to have been pulled or I am at a maximum faction with them

Get the squad ring quest completed and everytime you turn in ring to Hendi
she will give you pluses with Clerics.

However I dont get them anymore. I lost it around the time they made rings
nodrop to prevent the assholes from scamming people for money for them. The
ring is a faction based reward so if you didnt earn it you couldnt get it
recharged and people were selling them for 80pp and when the victim turned
it it it poofed and the seller went back and got it again. and resold it...
may have been a coincidence but it seemed to quit giving me faction on
recharge then.

Other than that I never found any faction improvements for them... they are
PriestsofMischief.

Maybe making honeyjum will do it. Its another all its own quest. It improves
a lot factions I just cant remember all who.

If you are interested in Rivervale quests above they are on my website. I
only have a few zones up right now as I am verifying them all myself if I
can.

Ligge
www.eqguide.com
